mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (comment, comment_date, comment_ip, comment_group, comment_step, comment_indent, user_id, community_id) SELECT #{comment}, NOW(), #{comment_ip}, IFNULL(MAX(comment_group), 0) + 1, IF(#{community_id} IS NULL, IFNULL(MAX(comment_step), 0) + 1000, 1000), 0, #{user_id}, #{community_id} FROM comment;

INSERT INTO comment (comment, comment_date, comment_ip, comment_group, comment_step, comment_indent, user_id, community_id) SELECT #{comment}, NOW(), #{comment_ip}, t.comment_group, IFNULL(MAX(t.comment_step), 0) - 1, t.comment_indent + 1, #{user_id}, #{community_id} FROM (SELECT comment_group, comment_step, comment_indent FROM comment WHERE comment_id = #{comment_id}) AS t;
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment = #{comment}, comment_ip = #{comment_ip}, comment_date = now() WHERE comment_id=#{comment_id}
